name: Kryptix2k25 - The Ultimate Cryptic Hunt
description: Welcome to Kryptix2k25! Solve cryptic puzzles, decode secrets, and prove your skills. Are you ready to crack the code?

levels.question: üîê The beginning of your journey: S2x5cHRpeDJrMjU=
levels.hint: This is Base64 encoded. Decode it to proceed.

levels.question: I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go inside. What am I?
levels.hint: You're probably using one right now to answer this.

levels.question: Decipher this Caesar cipher (shift 13): PELCGB
levels.hint: ROT13 is a simple substitution cipher. A becomes N, B becomes O...

levels.question: What comes next in this sequence? 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21, __
levels.hint: Each number is the sum of the previous two.

levels.question: üß© I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
levels.hint: Think about sounds that bounce back to you.

levels.question: Decode this binary: 01101000 01110101 01101110 01110100
levels.hint: Binary to ASCII conversion. Use an online converter if needed.

levels.question: I am the beginning of eternity, the end of time and space, the beginning of every end, and the end of every place. What am I?
levels.hint: Look at the first/last letters of key words in the riddle.

levels.question: üî¢ What's the next number? 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, __
levels.hint: These are all special numbers in mathematics - they're only divisible by 1 and themselves.

levels.question: Morse code challenge: -.- .-. -.-- .--. - .. -..-
levels.hint: Dash-dot-dash = K. Use a Morse code translator.

levels.question: üèÜ FINAL CHALLENGE: What has cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and water but no fish?
levels.hint: Think about something you use for navigation and directions.
